name: Checkers Jogatina HD
description:
Download now the best game of Checkers for the iPad!

Play along with more than 1,5 million people that already know the quality of the Jogatina apps. Have fun!

Download, click and play right now on your iPad! IT’S FREE!

- 3 difficulty level: Easy, Medium and Hard.
- Options: set the game to your way!
- Statistics: keep track of your improvement!
- Play WITHOUT LIMITS! Here you can play how many times you want.

Install Checkers for free on your iPad now!

Exercise your reasoning: think before you make a move. Have fun with this classic pastime!

Download now!

Also get to know other Jogatina apps!
